get.summary: List all blueprints in a department

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: To get blueprints by status, allowed values are @ACTIVE@ ,@INACTIVE@ and @DRAFT@

get.summary: Get Applied Blueprint details of ticket for a user
get.description: To get the applied blueprint details of a ticket

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Meta information related to the transition owners. Values allowed are: @transitionOwnerAgents@, @transitionOwnerTeams@, @transitionOwnerDept@ to include agents,teams,department under owners. You can pass multiple values by separating them with commas in the API request.

schema.description: Meta information related to the transition owners. Values allowed are: @transitionOwnerAgents@, @transitionOwnerTeams@, @transitionOwnerDept@ to include agents,teams,department under owners. You can pass multiple values by separating them with commas in the API request.

get.description: To get a specific blueprint details
